Text.text: $FindMySibling.YoungerSibling.FirstName$. Little idiot is probably picking fights
with small fry again. Like that proves anything.

SiblingSpeech2SpawnText.text: You now face me, $MyFirstName$! Flee in terror of me! (please).

SiblingSpeech2.text: I am $MyFirstName$ , conquerer of- wait, my $FindMySibling.OlderSibling.SiblingTitle$
